ing: 1 cup fat-free creamy salad dressing (ie: Fat Free Miracle Whip TM)
des: "A cool summer salad for hot summer nights. Goes well with sliced French bread.  You can use any shape pasta you want with this salad--bowties and rotini both work great!"
ins:
In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente,  rinse under cold water and drain.
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, ham, cheese and peas.
Whisk together the ranch dressing and Miracle Whip (TM). Pour over salad and toss to coat. Refrigerate until chilled and serve.
